name: H.R Giger
description:
Hans Ruedi Giger was part of the special effects team that won an Academy Award for the visual design of Ridley Scott's 1979 sci-fi horror film Alien. As a huge fan of Alien
movies, I've always thought about creating my version of one and decided to create an homage to the sequence in 2018. Rather than imitating his work, I described my feeling
when I saw the alien move. especially I put an effort into the contrast between Natural and Artificial that are like the origin of his ideas.
